info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 3:17PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Stephens County through 400 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Clarkesville, or 4 miles northeast of Mount Airy, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Toccoa, Martin, Avalon, Eastanolee and Boydville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
